meanings.definition: A person who designs or studies the efficiency and comfort of a person's working environment.
meanings.sent1: The ergonomist suggested adjusting the chair height for better posture.
meanings.sent2: The company hired an ergonomist to improve the office layout.
meanings.sent3: The ergonomist joked that sitting on a bean bag chair all day would be the ultimate ergonomic solution.
meanings.sent4: The ergonomist's mind was like a puzzle master, fitting pieces of comfort and efficiency together.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ergonomist carefully measuring desk heights stuck in my mind.
